movie_title: 3 Lesser-Known but Must-See Destinations in Japan
introduction: If you're travelling Japan, you should consider checking these places out. Not a lot of foreign trav

vocabulary.definition: not given enough recognition for its true value or importance
vocabulary.example: The film is underrated and deserves more attention from audiences.
The city's streets were filled with the bustle of shoppers during the holiday season.

vocabulary.definition: made by humans rather than occurring naturally
vocabulary.example: The dam created a manmade lake that provided water to the surrounding areas.

vocabulary.definition: left empty or no longer used
vocabulary.example: The abandoned house had vines growing up its walls and windows boarded up.
The water in the natural spring was believed to be purified and had healing properties.

vocabulary.definition: having a fear of being in enclosed or confined spaces
vocabulary.example: The small elevator made her feel claustrophobic and she had to take deep breaths to calm down.
